summary: This is a forwarded email alert from Critical Mention about a Yahoo Lifestyle article reporting on Prince Harry's comments regarding Prince Andrew's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein during a prank phone call. The email notes the article has significant estimated publicity value.

keyFacts: A Yahoo Lifestyle article reported on Prince Harry commenting about Prince Andrew's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein during a prank phone call.
The article was estimated to have over $4 million in publicity value according to the email alert.
The document shows media monitoring of Epstein-related coverage through Critical Mention's alert system.
The email was sent on March 11, 2020, indicating ongoing public and media interest in the Epstein case and its connections to high-profile individuals.
